website_summaries.verdict: These fenders put an interesting twist on the standard design, but they're not well suited to larger boats.
pros: Includes a pair of contour fenders and fender lines
cons: These fenders are small and some say they don't work as well as inflatable fenders

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these!  Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bumpers. I bought a few and they have worked very well. I have my speed boat tied up tightly to the dock (which has no bumpers of its own). All I have for protection are these bumpers and they have worked perfectly. I am very happy with them. I did not shop around so I am not sure if the price on Amazon is the best or not.
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnHurlow

customer_reviews.title: Best type of Fenders for boats
customer_reviews.text: These fenders are great to have on the boat and store better than the traditional fenders. I love that they come with rope! For the price you can not beat them I have gone back and ordered more because they are so handy and conform to the boat. I have them on my Baja and Sailboat. Time will tell how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: cash

customer_reviews.title: Accomplished a Difficult Problem
customer_reviews.text: These function very well on the river and because they are relatively narrow make it dramatically easier to board and get off the boat compared to my usual 10 to 12 inch circular bumpers.this was my reason for purchase They are also easier to store. It is used against a floating dock,I am not as sure against a wooden pier would depend on how rough the water would be.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trailerable boats
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic bumpers. I like them a lot more than the rubber ones as these can fold flat and take up far less space. I do not dock my boat so I need these to be portable, but theyre perfect for going back to the ramp if it's crowded and needing to drop someone off. They will fold and bend on the gunnel far better than the rubber bumpers, they're excellent for trailering boats
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I saw bumpers like this at bass pro for a way higher price. I bought these unsure of what to expect but I love them! We tie them off to cleats on the sides of our boats and they do a great job keeping the boat from banging up against the dock. I like how they have some bend at the top of the bumper. These work very well and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Dusky

customer_reviews.title: Not For Docking
customer_reviews.text: Maybe these things might work for a small boat that's already in a slip. I have no "slip" - I needed something to protect my boat when I'm approaching the dock. These aren't built strong enough for that. When this thing contacted the dock, the ring attachment ripped open, and the whole "BoatTector" thing fell into the water. I tossed all of them in the trash - they're useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: CriticalMass

customer_reviews.title: $8.06 Investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for $8.06, black. Totally impressed. I have used similar brands a 4 times the cost. I bought another set once these arrived just to have as spares when the first set wears out. at $8.06 another reviewer wrote the ropes are worth more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Maltese Owner

customer_reviews.title: They have wings....but I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.text: These were just the ticket for our 19’ runabout. Easy to store and when you get the lines set right hug the boat nicely. Word of caution, they are much lighter than the round plastic bumpers and WILL take flight if you don’t put them away.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A Beem

customer_reviews.title: Wondered about these for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the quality for the price...wonderfully surprised! They are awesome! Great quality and are holding up quite nicely on the edges of our boat dock! Seriously protects our boat! We plan to purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Devlynne Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Durability???
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our boat because I had previously owned a previous product and loved it. After only using these 2 times out on the lake they ripped. I used them they way they should be used and this is the end result and now I am not able to return them. I DO NOT recommend this product!!! Disappointed Customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price paid.
customer_reviews.text: These bumpers/genders seem nice quality for less than other companies were selling them for. Happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for boat use due to their very light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately there is nothing good to say about these bumpers. When the slightest amount of wind blows they blow on the dock not protecting boat.. To some it up to light for marine use. Would not recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Samuel P.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Stop Looking more options, for the price, you will get perfect quality, and durability, easy to install, and fits in small spaces, i bought it for my Jetsky and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and high quality. The square flat design is helpful in spaces on my dock where the round bumpers don't work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Citi-Zen

customer_reviews.title: Still works great after a few months in water outside
customer_reviews.text: Still looks great and holding up after a few months of being in water 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: They did not fit my application so returned but made well.
customer_reviews.author: aaluck

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for my small fishing boat
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't really impressed by these. Used for a smaller rig and it didn't work as well as inflated bumpers. Ended up using these as seat cushions for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Yeti

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: As the wake went up and down, so did these.
customer_reviews.author: Penny L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Worked well to protect my boat.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fenders that worked well for my sailboat at the dock we used this summer. The Velcro pads stuck well on the boat, not so well on the fenders. Tied off to small cleats on the boats, the fenders stayed in place and protected the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Bob W

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet, but for $13 they could break in 6 months & I wouldn't care. The ropes alone are worth that. Can't wait to try them out!
customer_reviews.author: foosdiva

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: These work well to protect the top and side of the gunnel on my small wood boat. They store under my seats and contribute to floatation.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burch

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and store. Works great for all types of boats
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for a Gheenoe LT25. Easy to move up and down gunwales where needed to protect the wide chines when docked.
customer_reviews.author: D Downs

customer_reviews.title: Work great and look good!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bumpers that look good also. I like this look better than the ugly round ones.
customer_reviews.author: MotMan616

customer_reviews.title: They are ok but don’t work as well as we hoped.
customer_reviews.text: They work but after using several times we are back to using a combination of these and a few of the regular bulky ones. They do store nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We got these to try and they were great!! No problem hooking to the boat easy for beginners to understand!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Pottker

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not the best
customer_reviews.text: Unless your using hardware to affix these they aren't exactly what we had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: The Goddards

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: These work great and hold up well even in salt water. Comes with the ropes so they attach easily to the boat and can be easily flipped up into the boat while traveling to the boat ramps.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Prefect!
customer_reviews.text: Eyelets are prefect! Work as they should & very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Newmanfamily

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Has held up well on many trips out on our jet skis.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, work excellent on my pontoon boat. Ropes that come with fenders are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tim F.

customer_reviews.title: They work great as they stop them from scratching each other
customer_reviews.text: Use these to store our boats side by side. They work great as they stop them from scratching each other. Great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection
customer_reviews.text: These boat fenders are great. At only a couple of inches thick, they are very compact but offer plenty of protection. Work great dockside of my pontoon. No huge gap from deck to dock.
customer_reviews.author: Skatin Layton

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Keeps my boat from banging dock
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These work well and store easily because there flat not round.
customer_reviews.author: PBoyer

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought 4 sets of these instead of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought 4 sets of these instead of the other trash. At least I bought 2 pairs of these
customer_reviews.author: Shaggs

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect storage. They fit in the boat much better than traditional air filled round bumpers!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bumpers that work well, fold flat, and take up a small amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: Brassbass

customer_reviews.title: ... soon as our PA winter is over--can't wait--my husband loved them--love the color--and the
customer_reviews.text: will use on our boat as soon as our PA winter is over--can't wait--my husband loved them--love the color--and the length
customer_reviews.author: cindy scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Saves space, it could use to be a little thicker...as is
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good and is a real space saver...
customer_reviews.author: Tony Aquila

customer_reviews.title: Great as bumpers against docks or
customer_reviews.text: Not for use as fenders. Great as bumpers against docks or ?
customer_reviews.author: Erica Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way better than using stupid buoys. Keeps the boat covered
customer_reviews.author: Zacc

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dinghy or Small Craft Fenders
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of fenders with rope for dinghy or small craft. Great value, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: rj1118

customer_reviews.title: They work so much better.
customer_reviews.text: These dont lie flat on the boat. Im sticking with the round ones. They work so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stevens

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when we were tied up next to another boat.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Exact same thing as Bass Pro sells for half the price!
customer_reviews.author: gus

customer_reviews.title: but they work great on my 20' ski boat
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment on how they work on a larger boat, but they work great on my 20' ski boat.
customer_reviews.author: CStearns

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had them out on the water, they lay flat and store right. Can't attest do the durability but they seem as good as the more expensive options found in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked as I intended it to. Screwed it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as I intended it to. Screwed it in the PVC piling cover and keeps my boat off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jankowski

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Good
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bumpers. Works great for a quick easy tie up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Work the way it should
customer_reviews.text: Worst Bumper ever, bought 4 of these for a 24' boat. The distance between the boat and the dock is not enough the boat still hit the dock and got scratched biggest mistake I've made so far with my equipment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extreme max bumper
customer_reviews.text: Its works ..I like them cause they don't ride up and stay in place
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The Boatectors are great, however, the fender ropes were not included. The product packaging pictured the ropes and said they were included.
customer_reviews.author: DVaughn

customer_reviews.title: thin and very cheep looking but guess I got what ...
customer_reviews.text: thin and very cheep looking but guess I got what I paid for. Will never order from this vendor again
customer_reviews.author: jim p

customer_reviews.title: Stay clear  cheap made
customer_reviews.text: I think these are extremely cheap ,disappointed will not ever do business with this company again.The cover is cheap thin plastic not fabric like the quality bumpers. Ultra violet light will destroy these in one season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Extreme Max 3006.7231 BoatTector 24" Contour Fender Value Pack, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BlueContour Fenders provide excellent protection, with a wraparound design that protects both gunwale and hull. Unlike round fenders, their square design stows efficiently in limited storage space. Closed cell foam construction means that the fender will never deflate or collapse. These contour fenders are 24" x 6. 5" x 2. 5". UV and tear resistant, with a marine-grade tri-laminate cover, double thermal-bonded seams, and corrosion-proof polycarbonate grommets. Two-year replacement . To keep your shopping simple, we've also included a pair of high-quality, 3/8" x 5' solid-braid fender lines - the perfect length and diameter for use with this fender. Two-year replacement .
feature_bullets: Includes pair of fenders (24" x 6. 5" x 2. 5") and fender lines (3/8" x 6')
Durable, marine-grade tri-laminate cover with double thermal-bonded seams and corrosion-proof polycarbonate grommets
